}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== '''Intel Tri-Band Wireless-AC 18265''' - NGFF Card (Oak Peak) *802.11ac 2x2 (867Mbps), BT 4.2, Board Form Factor: M.2 2230 (Key A) *802.11ad 60 GHz WiGig wireless, combined with a AC 8265 (NBR) :RFEM 3: 10101R, abgn+ac+ad, 2x2:2, 60GHz phased array
==Links of Interest== :[https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/wireless-products/tri-band-wireless-ac-wigig-18265-brief.html Product brief] :[https://ark.intel.com/products/95080/Intel-Tri-Band-Wireless-AC-18265 Specification] (ARK)
